Caption: Dr. Erhard Eppler addresses the audience at the computer inauguration function. On the dais from the left; Prof. S. Sampath, Prof. A. Ramachandran, Prof. K.T. Chandy (Chairman, Board of Governors), Mr. C. Subramaniam (Union Minister), Prof. K.A.V. Pandalai (Director)
Event: Special Convocation, Inauguration of Computer Centre
